query:
UPDATE project_statuses
            SET
                name = $1,
                color = $2,
                sort_order = $3
            WHERE id = $4
            RETURNING
                id              AS "id!: Uuid",
                project_id      AS "project_id!: Uuid",
                name            AS "name!",
                color           AS "color!",
                sort_order      AS "sort_order!",
                created_at      AS "created_at!: DateTime<Utc>"
